title: Black and white sandwich cake
ingredients: ['175g butter or margarine', '175g caster sugar', '3 medium eggs', '150g self raising flour', '1/2 teaspoon baking powder', '2 handfuls chocolate chips', '25g cocoa powder', 'Icing', '230g soft butter', '450g icing sugar', 'cocoa powder to taste', 'plain chocolate for grating over the top (optional)']
